Package enumerateWeightedSetCovers

Class Solution

  • java.lang.Object
    • enumerateWeightedSetCovers.Solution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    public class Solution
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    This class represents a solution to a weighted set cover problem. Internally, a solution is implemented using a BitSet, which indicates which sets of the problem are part of the solution. In addition, we store the weight of the solution Note that at different points in the runtime, this object may not be an actual set cover, but is is used to represent the solution being derived

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Solution()
      Constructs an empty solution
      Solution​(java.util.BitSet sets, int weight)
      creates a solution with the given sets and weight
